doc:
Jim Tavaré https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Tavar%C3%A9 0 Jim Tavaré (born 1963) is an English stand-up comedian, actor, and musician. He is best known for his work on The Sketch Show on ITV, which won a BAFTA award. He played the role of Tom (the owner of the Leaky Cauldron) in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban, and has appeared in several music videos, including Roots Manuva's "Too Cold", McFly's "It's All About You" (for BBC Comic Relief), Phoenix Foundation's "Thames Soup", and Letlive's "Banshee". Jim_Tavaré ( born 1963 ) is an_English_stand-up_comedian , actor , and musician . He is_best_known for his_work on The_Sketch_Show on ITV , which won a_BAFTA_award . He played the_role of Tom_( the_owner of the_Leaky_Cauldron_) in Harry_Potter and the_Prisoner of Azkaban , and has_appeared in several_music_videos , including Roots_Manuva 's_"_Too_Cold_" , McFly 's_" It 's All About You " ( for BBC_Comic_Relief_) , Phoenix_Foundation 's_"_Thames_Soup_" , and Letlive 's_"_Banshee_" .
